sentences.en: a memento of our trip to Italy
sentences.cn: 我们意大利之旅的纪念品

sentences.en: He keeps a lock of her hair as a memento.
sentences.cn: 他保留著她的一束头发作纪念.

sentences.en: Here is a pen as a memento.
sentences.cn: 送给你一支钢笔作纪念.

sentences.en: Hold the memento and return in your mind to the place where you got it.
sentences.cn: 拿着纪念品,想想你是在哪里得到它的.

sentences.en: It is a very special memento to me, which I display in my office.
sentences.cn: 他对于我来说是一件特殊的纪念品, 我把它陈列在办公室里.

sentences.en: Just left most hurting memento at the eng?
sentences.cn: 然后留下,最痛的纪念品?

sentences.en: Keep a photo or memento on your desk.
sentences.cn: 在办公桌上放一张照片或纪念品.

sentences.en: More anglers are taking cameras when they go fishing to provide a memento of catches.
sentences.cn: 更多的垂钓者去钓鱼的时候带上了照相机，以便钓上鱼后留个纪念。

sentences.en: My friend gave me his picture as a memento before going away.
sentences.cn: 我的朋友在离别前给我一张照片留作纪念品.

sentences.en: Or, you can purchase the Olympic memento, give help to Olympics Games!
sentences.cn: 或者, 你去购买一些奥运的纪念品, 为奥运提供一点帮助.

sentences.en: Please give your autograph as a memento.
The director will be presented with a memento for his long years of service.
sentences.cn: 主管因为公司效力多年将获赠予纪念品.

sentences.en: The Hong Shan public square is dismantled as a memento soon!
sentences.cn: 洪山广场即将被拆除留念!

sentences.en: The photos will be a permanent memento of your wedding.
sentences.cn: 这些照片会成为你婚礼的永久纪念.

sentences.en: They gave him a watch as a memento of his time with the company.
sentences.cn: 他们送了他一块手表作为为公司服务的纪念.

words.tran_cn: 显著的，难忘的；值得纪念的
纪念碑，纪念馆；纪念仪式；纪念物
纪念品，引起回忆的东西

trans.tran_cn: 遗物，纪念品，用以回忆的东西
trans.tran_en: a small thing that you keep to remind you of someone or something
